scripts.db:reset: rimraf prisma/dev.db && pnpm run prisma:migrate --name init && pnpm run db:seed
scripts.test: pnpm run db:migrate:test:ci && pnpm run test:unit && pnpm run test:gql && pnpm run test:integration
scripts.test:watch: pnpm run assert:test-db && cross-env NODE_ENV=test TEST_SUITE=unit vitest src/**/*.unit.test.ts src/**/__tests__/unit/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:integration: pnpm run assert:test-db && cross-env NODE_ENV=test TEST_SUITE=integration vitest run src/__tests__/integration --passWithNoTests
scripts.test:unit: pnpm run assert:test-db && cross-env NODE_ENV=test TEST_SUITE=unit vitest run src/**/*.unit.test.ts src/**/__tests__/unit/**/*.test.ts --passWithNoTests
scripts.test:unit:coverage: pnpm run assert:test-db && cross-env NODE_ENV=test TEST_SUITE=unit vitest run src/**/*.unit.test.ts src/**/__tests__/unit/**/*.test.ts --passWithNoTests --coverage
scripts.db:migrate:test:ci: pnpm run assert:test-db && cross-env DATABASE_URL=file:./prisma/test.db prisma migrate deploy --schema=prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.test:integration:ci: pnpm run db:migrate:test:ci && pnpm run test:integration
scripts.test:gql: pnpm run assert:test-db && cross-env NODE_ENV=test vitest run src/__tests__/graphql
